Name: God Hates Us
About the game: An incredibly interesting logic game aimed at your reaction and dexterity, dodging falling blocks of various properties, getting to the exit every time you doom yourself to punishment from heaven! God Hates Us - in this game with a logical component, the player takes control of a character who can deftly jump and jump through blocks, dodging other falling blocks, moving to the exit. Dozens of rich levels filled with danger and logical placement of obstacles, where you will need your quickness of mind and sleight of hand. Feature of game: - Complexity - Beautiful Visual style - Dynamic Music - 30 levels
